data.title: Caris Life Sciences beats Q4 earnings expectations, reports 125% sales growth at $292.89 million, expects growth in 2026.
data.description: Caris Life Sciences Inc. (NASDAQ: CAI) exceeded expectations with its fourth-quarter earnings report. The company reported earnings of 28 cents per share, surpassing the projected loss of 3 cents per share. Quarterly sales saw a significant increase, rising by 125% year over year to $292.89 million, well above the expected $208.63 million. The growth in demand for Caris Life Sciences' platform has been robust, driving increased volume and revenue. The company is looking to maintain this positive momentum by advancing its pipeline, with plans to launch the Caris Detect solution in the first half of 2026. David Dean Halbert, the Founder, Chairman, and CEO of Caris Life Sciences, expressed optimism about the future and identified the upcoming launch as a key growth opportunity for the company.

data.title: Grindr reports 28% full-year revenue growth in Q4 earnings per NYSE update. NYSE issues pre-market advisory every day.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) released a daily pre-market advisory straight from the trading floor. Investors can obtain valuable market insights by accessing this update before the market opens. This initiative aims to provide timely information to traders, offering a competitive edge in the dynamic trading landscape. Stay ahead of the game by reviewing the NYSE Pre-market update daily to make informed investment decisions.

data.title: PayPal, MoonPay, and M0 introduce PYUSDx for apps to make their stablecoins, backed by PayPal USD. Fast launch, cross-chain capable, with custom tokens.
data.description: PYUSDx is a platform that allows developers to create stablecoins specific to their apps, backed by PayPal USD. The platform offers a quick launch process, support for cross-chain transactions, and options for branded tokens.

data.title: Bath & Body Works collaborates with PEEPS for a limited-time collection bringing the iconic treat to life.
data.description: For a limited time, a special collection is available featuring the beloved Marshmallow treat transformed into a delightful fragrance perfect for festive gifting. This unique collection captures the essence of the iconic treat and offers a memorable sensory experience. Don't miss this opportunity to indulge in the sweetness of marshmallows with this exclusive collection.

data.title: OneMedNet launches new phase with RWD Platform powered by Palantir Foundry; enhancing data capabilities.
data.description: OneMedNet has revealed the next stage of its commercial launch featuring their Real-World Data (RWD) Platform, which operates using the Palantir Foundry technology.

data.title: ADT to report Q4 earnings of 22 cents/share on $1.3 billion revenue, annual dividend yield of 2.71%. Investors eye gains.
data.description: ADT Inc. (NYSE: ADT) is set to announce its Q4 earnings on March 2, with analysts predicting earnings of 22 cents per share, up from last year's 20 cents. Revenue for the quarter is estimated to reach $1.3 billion, compared to the previous year's $1.26 billion. A new five-year commercial agreement was recently unveiled by ADT, Origin AI, and Verisure on Feb. 24. ADT's current annual dividend yield stands at 2.71%, equating to a quarterly dividend of 5.5 cents per share. Investors are showing interest in ADT’s dividend potential alongside its recent performance. To achieve $500 monthly earnings from ADT, the yearly target is $6,000, with calculations based on the quarterly dividend amount. Further details can be found on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Argenx SE (NASDAQ: ARGX) beats Q4 earnings forecasts with $8.02 EPS, sales rise to $1.32B, surpassing $1.29B estimate.
data.description: Argenx SE (NASDAQ: ARGX) announced positive Phase 3 ADAPT OCULUS study results for VYVGART in adults with ocular myasthenia gravis (oMG) alongside their fourth-quarter financial report. Earnings were $8.02 per share, higher than the expected $6.02, and sales rose from $761.2 million to $1.32 billion, surpassing the estimated $1.29 billion. CEO Tim Van Hauwermeiren stated that the company had a successful year in 2025, reaching 19,000 global patients with VYVGART, expanding into gMG and CIDP markets, launching a pre-filled syringe, and progressing pipeline development.

data.title: Hifas da Terra, with 25+ years of experience in Europe, launches in the US with science-backed mushroom supplements.
data.description: In Pontevedra, Spain, on February 27, 2026, the European supplement company Hifas da Terra announced its launch in the United States. The brand introduces a new standard for scientifically supported mushroom supplements in the American wellness sector. These supplements are backed by clinical research and offer traceability, setting a benchmark for the market.

data.title: City of Phoenix awards Everytable $3 million Meals on Wheels contract, enhancing food access for senior residents.
data.description: Phoenix, Arizona has awarded a $3 million contract to Everytable, a food company dedicated to providing fresh, scratch-cooked meals to all residents. The contract aims to enhance food access and community care for senior residents in the city. This initiative is set to bring crucial support and resources to seniors, promoting their well-being and access to nutritious meals. The partnership between the City of Phoenix and Everytable signifies a significant step towards addressing the needs of the senior population and improving overall quality of life in the community.
